text: Jack Forsyth "Cy" McClairen (March 2, 1931 - December 28, 2020) was an American football player and coach. He played professionally as an end for the Pittsburgh Steelers of the National Football League (NFL) from 1955 to 1960. McClairen was born in Panama City, Florida. McClairen died on December 28, 2020 in Daytona Beach, Florida at the age of 89.BCU Legend Jack “Cy” McClairen Passes Away at 89 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:American football defensive ends Category:Sportspeople from Florida
title: Cy McClairen
